alpha_demo_test_1.description: Test case for a simple momentum factor using daily close price.

variables.close_{t-5}: Closing price 5 trading days before t

alpha_demo_test_1.gt_code:
import pandas as pd

data_pv = pd.read_hdf('daily_pv.h5')
close = data_pv['$close']
result = (close - close.shift(5)) / close.shift(5)
result.to_hdf('result.h5', key='data')
